text: 14.4 2 Ko 11.2, Epe 5.27, Jem 1.18, Lep 3.4, 5.9 Bɨ anɨb okok nɨm, kɨli bin ayɨp ma kɨnɨlak gach ma gak.14.4 Glik takaw anɨb agup, kɨli bin ayɨp ma kɨnɨlak. Pen bɨ gos nɨgep kuŋay kɨli anɨgɨl apal, Takaw anɨb ak pal adaŋ lɨl apal. Takaw jɨj ne anɨgɨl mɨdeb, binbɨ kɨli God gos ne nɨgup ak nep kɨdek gɨl, tap tɨmel ogɨnap ma gɨl gɨpal.  Mɨdtep gɨl suŋtep mɨdebal. Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ak ayɨp nep ajebal. Bɨ anɨb okok, God ne binɨb yokɨp nab okok nɨb kɨlop dak. God ne ned nep kɨlop aglɨl adɨkɨd dak. Anɨb ak tek, kɨli God ayɨp Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk ayɨp yenɨgabal.
